author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44935
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44935
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr.	10732	IN	CNAME	betagouv-redirections.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 06:11:14 GMT Location: https://errial.georisques.gouv.fr X-Request-Id: 08249a3a-98bc-441a-ae8b-f0bf3db22695 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr/'

response:

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
kelrisks.beta.gouv.fr.	10609	IN	CNAME	betagouv-redirections.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2277339532 10000 2400 604800 3600
